import React from 'react'; const InputFilters = () => { return (
# ID Score Level Price {listShow && listShow.map((metamon, index) => { return ( {index + 1} {metamon.token_id} {metamon?.score} {metamon?.level} {numberWithCommas(metamon.fixed_price)} (~{(raca * metamon.fixed_price).toFixed(2)}) ) })}
) }; export default InputFilters;
